website_summaries.verdict: Customers swear this coffee scrub has reduced the visibility of stretch marks, varicose veins and other blemishes. But many advise it's not the best face scrub.
pros: Several customers report this product reduced the appearance of stretch marks and varicose veins
Promotes the growth of healthy skin cells
cons: Can make skin feel a little greasy
Some say it's a great body scrub, but too harsh and grainy for the face

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I trust this brand and have purchased several of their products. This is the only thing I have bought from them that I dislike. I was surprised that the container was tiny. It was clearly marked as 8 oz so that's on me. Their Himalayan salt scrub is 20 oz so that's the size I was expecting. While the coffee scent is wonderful and it seems to moisturize and exfoliate very well, I just can't get past what a mess it is to use this. Brown coffee grounds get all over the place no matter how carefully I scoop it out. I'll stick with the salt scrub which seems to moisturize and exfoliate even better without the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the dry, dry valley and I have tried lotions, Vaseline, everything! I’ve found that exfoliating is key, especially for the bumps on the upper arms and thighs. Also, there is no miracle cure for spider veins and cellulite but I believe this is one important step for manually improving circulation (without paying for a massage every other day) and reducing aching legs. I use it in the mornings and you better believe my brain responds to that coffee scent! My boyfriend admits to sneaking some for his face, which has actually helped with the ingrown mustache hairs. So there you go! Multipurpose and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Deminished the appearance of my stretch marks!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and has already majorly diminished the appearance of my stretch marks! I've always had really deep stretch marks on my stomach since I was a teenager and nothing has ever helped until now. I've been using this in the shower about 3-4 times a week and they're much less visible now, I'm honestly shocked. I've been using this scrub for about two weeks now and I'm almost out so I'm ordering another container, its definitely worth it and much less expensive than other stuff I've tired in the past. Would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great!
customer_reviews.text: If you LOVE the smell of coffee then you’ll fully enjoy this scrub. The texture is truly gritty to really get the dead skin off and help with cellulite stimulation but the amount of moisturizing ingredients don’t let it tear your skin up. It’s a perfect balance and it works! Used consistently, which is key with anything you want a result from, I did see an improvement in my skin texture on my outer thighs, upper arm, stomach and booty.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know you'd need a coffee filter to use it
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use this in your bathtub, unless you have a strainer in your drain. My entire tub is covered in ground coffee bits, and no telling how much went down the drain and could potetbionally damage my plumbing. Smells good in container, but made my skin look like I put on fake tanner lotion
customer_reviews.author: Viraga

customer_reviews.title: not at all what i expected; could not use it
customer_reviews.text: This scrub smells great but it it fluffy like a pile of coffee grinds and falls out of the jar in big clumps. There is no cohesion and it's still somehow really greasy. I can't use it. I threw it away after one attempt and am going to get Lush Sea Salt Scrub like I should've done in the first place. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: A little TOO hydrating, but definitely a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the smell of this stuff! Every time I use it, I immediately want coffee. It definitely exfoliates and hydrates very well, and I would have given it 5 stars except that it makes me feel kind of greasy. I have to scrub myself off with a dry towel after I shower to get the film off. However, I have noticed that my skin is looking firmer, and is lacking in those ugly little red bumps I usually see. It's worth it to have a bit of greasiness to see such a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Julesie_O

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month on my arms and chest. Biggest difference Is the texture of my skin. The scent really makes my shower smell like I am actually having coffee in the shower. Be aware you will have coffee grounds in the shower to rinse away. Was surprised at this initially because I thought the product would desolve but it appears to be actual coffee grounds. That is no problem will be buying this again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good scrub
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not overbearing. It's actually nice. I used it in the shower and my skin was so smooth afterwards that I did not even need lotion/cream. Ive only used it once so far and cant wait to use it again. I wont use it everyday-I'm actually going to follow the instructions on the container and see how it works out for me. I have yet to use it on my face since I have very sensitive skin but I looking forward to giving it a try. I definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: yc

customer_reviews.title: ArtNaturals for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of ArtNaturals, so I’m super excited to see how this scrub performs! Coffee is such a great choice for a body scrub; it has many skin benefits and the aroma is just heavenly!!
customer_reviews.author: Dynabear

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I began using this before my wedding because I wanted to start taking better care of my skin. I was looking for something organic and natural when I found this. I have used this product several times and can tell a huge difference in my skin. I have red bumps on my arms that I have had my whole life. Nothing seemed to help it but this product reduced the amount of bumps and redness within one use. As long as I use it every couple days, my arms are almost completely cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Art Naturals is one of my favorite organic skin care lines
customer_reviews.text: Art Naturals is one of my favorite organic skin care lines. It's not crazy expensive and they feel so luxurious. This coffee scrub is a great pick me up. I use it on my face and body and it's amazing. No, there is no lingering smell of coffee (at least from what I have noticed).
customer_reviews.author: Lany Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The smell of coffee in this product is amazing !!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this scrub. I just started using it I like how the ingredients are natural and easy to read that makes me feel good on what goes on my body. After all your skin is your largest organ, So you have to take care it. The smell is amazing of course , I also like the way it goes on it’s not too rough as long as you apply a bit of water to it. After I rinsed it off though my skin has never felt so soft , smooth, hydrated and plumped in my life ! I will continue to use this twice a week it is amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Vn

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliates and moisturizes really well
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of coffee. It exfoliates really well along with moisturizing. Leaves the skin very soft, that is especially good for me since I have dry skin. I’ve bought this product twice and will continue to purchase until I find something new that works for me, if I do.
customer_reviews.author: Keiriston

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: The product came banged up and leaking everywhere. The smell doesnt even smell like coffee but instead tobacco. It's super greasy, I dont know that I'm excited to try it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: B.Lap

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Aroma
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product! It smells wonderful, exfoliates without feeling like sandpaper & softens your skin with all the essential oils without feeling greasy! Also the best price around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, don't use it too often though
customer_reviews.text: This scrub does a very good job at leaving your body smooth and soft. I appreciate the use of shea butter instead of some other oil because it doesnt lesve you feeling too oily or greasy after use. I will say, do not use this scrub too frequently, as it seems to be pretty strong and I noticed any pimples or blemishes I may have do not benefit from a daily use. Every other day or just 2 or 3 times a week works best.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: So please take a chance on this product and maybe you can have beautiful legs again to
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time i have ever gave a review on an item and believe me i have purchased so many brands but the first time i used this product i really noticed a huge difference in the ugly varicose veins on my legs and then i wanted to use it more and now they're so much lighter than before and hopefully one day soon i will be able to wear a dress again and ladies hopefully you can understand that. So please take a chance on this product and maybe you can have beautiful legs again to. Thank you very much for making a product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Smooths and fades stretch marks as said.
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 for my mom for Christmas, since she's busy and forgets to make her own from our morning brews (it's a hassle) anyhow, it works. Her belly stretch marks has significantly faded and gone smoother. I also tried it twice on my sensitive acne prone face and not much happened, but got smoother. 1 star down since she wished it was a mask, not a dry scrub, which can get everywhere lol.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella⚡️

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best stuff I have ever used before I could even rinse it all the way off I could already tell my skin was softer it's amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jessica h

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It will be my best friend this summer on the beach and wearing shorts! :) It smells so good and does what it says. It helped reduce the appearance of cellulite on my butt and thighs and makes your skin so smoothe! I recommend to anyone needing a lil boost for their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katyperryandginger

customer_reviews.title: Find a different scrub
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is the consistency of course sand. Its almost like its missing the oil a typical scrub would have. Its crumbly and looks like potting soil in my bath. I used it once and threw it away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Aalyx

customer_reviews.title: The most unique scrub and a moisturizer too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique product. I have used a bunch of scrubs over the years. This one is spectacular. It is a great exfoliant and has a moisturizer in it that makes the skin feel very soft and smooth. Totally unique and totally awesome. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and I love how smooth my skin feels after using.
customer_reviews.author: R Duff

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love how it leaves the skin felling once you rinse it off, nice and smooth. Does a great job exfoliating the skin and I’m a big coffee lover fan with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliant but too oily.
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job as a scrub but it leaves an oily film on your skin. I used it to exfoliate my self tanner off and it worked well but I can’t stand the oily feel of it. And avoid getting it around/in your mouth. Tastes terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good scrub
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product, and smells fantastic. Make my heel and elbow really soft afterward. I don't even need to put on moisture afterward because the lovely oil in it. Love it will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of the best coffee body scrubs I have used. It does not leave skin sticky like other ones I have used in the past. Leaves my skin feeling very soft and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for me
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried body scrubs before. I read the reviews on many and decided to try this one. I just wasn't to my liking and I think I wasn't feeling the coffee smell. I felt it was a little too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a mess this makes..Even when using in the shower. I did not like this.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Been using it twice a week and my body has changed! I feel my dry legs moisturized and super soft. It's just a bit messy but I mean, all it takes is a few washes and your tub/shower is good.
customer_reviews.author: anamoa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This body scrub is great makes my skin smooth and doesn't make me break out. It's very moisturizing, I will keep buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: TORE UP TOP TO DOESN'T CLOSE
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable received top smashed to DOES NOT CLOSE .NO MOISTURE
customer_reviews.author: Cateyed Woman

customer_reviews.title: I can't say it improves my skin all that much but it smells nice and feels nice at the moment of exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: The product inside the container is just ok, I can't say it improves my skin all that much but it smells nice and feels nice at the moment of exfoliating. My main problem with this product is that there is very little product regardless of price. Maybe its because I am tall but after one use it was almost gone. I wound up giving the little bit that was leftover to my niece and she adores it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Sealed product but oil still came out!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product even seeing some of the picture of others about the oils spilling out. I received the product and the oils spilled into the box. I had to add oil to it. Never had this issue with the coffee scrub of other brand been delivered during the summer of Las Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberle

customer_reviews.title: Really soft skin
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel so soft. It may also help diminish stretch marks (seems less noticeable).
customer_reviews.author: Christine Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Love this scrub
customer_reviews.text: Love this scrub! Keeps my skin soft and look alive and awake! Plus the smell of the coffee in the morning is so refreshing and fixes my coffee cravings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't used your bare hands.  Get gloves or a body scrub brush
customer_reviews.text: Reduce shaving razor bumps dramatically from the first use. Softens, smooths and moisturizes. I would recommend to get washcloth gloves but when I used my back scrubbing shower brush on the back my thighs it got rid of my ingrown hairs. Love this scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Makes skin supple and soft, pairs very well with some hemp lotion I purchased. Smells absolutely divine. Also is great to use before shaving. I did not use on my face, as I am prone to acne. I was bloated one day, and I used this stuff on my belly and the bloating was gone!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected!  Will most definitely get my business again!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected! Will most definitely get my business again!
customer_reviews.author: Sdomeracki

customer_reviews.title: Oily hot chocolate smell
customer_reviews.text: Super oily despite all the oil leaking out into the box. Super grainy. Smells like a weird hot chocolate- not really coffee. :(
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: It made made my skin so soft, it smells great, I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vannatter

customer_reviews.title: ... my thighs and upper arms and it really exfoliates nicely! This is my first time using artnaturals products ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once on my thighs and upper arms and it really exfoliates nicely! This is my first time using artnaturals products and so far between the Arabica Cofffee Scrub and the Dead Sea Mud Mask, I am very pleased and impressed with the results from both!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P (KY)

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a month now and it's done quite a bit for my skin. Cleaning out acne and overall redness of my skin. I'm not the normal person for this kind of product but after some convincing from the girlfriend I gave it a shot and I truly like it. Had some issues with the packaging recently and it was cleared up very quickly by the seller, so also a big recommendation of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lepah

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of coffee scrubs and this one didn’t disappoint. I was comfortable with the ingredients- no weird crap in there- which is why I chose this one. I don’t have stretch marks so I can’t comment on that, but I do like the rejuvenation I feel in the shower and after.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Smells like coffee. Leaves your skin very soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Smells like coffee. Leaves your skin very soft and smooth. One of the better scrubs I have used. It says you can use it on your face but I don't think that is a good idea as it has nut shell pieces that might be too rough.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: 1 of the Best Facial Scrubs I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful scrub! Gentle enough to use on your face or the rest of your body. I could tell a difference in my face only after 1 use. It left my skin very smooth & vibrant. I actually use it twice a week! Also if u love coffee u will love the coffee aroma from this scrub. Would definitely purchase again!! The customer service was wonderful!! 😀👍
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Love that this makes my skin feel smooth, and baby soft.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeBoe

customer_reviews.title: Toxic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. It has soybean oil, fragance and chloride, really harmful ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Eddy & Sara

customer_reviews.title: Coffee scrub
customer_reviews.text: I did not really like the quality of this product. I have used coffee scrub from other brand what a day and night difference. This one feels and smells like its homemade, the quality is inferior, I am not buying this scrub again.
customer_reviews.author: APH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and does not leave you with the sensation of a film left on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tere Melgarejo

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub. It has a pleasant natural coffee smell. It contains oil, so it moisturizes the skin as well. After use, my skin has become soft and moisturized. It is such a pleasure to use it. I'm going to order it more!
customer_reviews.author: Irina Flores

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves your skin feeling silky smooth after the first use. I have sensitive skin that is easily irritated by scent and other additives, but this product is amazing for sensitive skin and smells really great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this because there are ingredients which I don’t like that we’re not shown in the image provided for this product. Including soybean oil, caramel, and fragrance. Not the product I was expecting based on the product description and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 on effectiveness!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product. It smells amazing and made my skin feel so smooth! I’ve always had issues with dry itchy skin and this product has completely changed that my skin is always so soft and I’ve gotten so many compliments on how great my skin is looking.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Already opened. Want my money back
customer_reviews.text: It got delivered today, and I got it today. I opened it and the seal was already open, and ig looked it like it was used. You could feel the coffee and smell the coffee from inside the packaging. Still gonna use it tho. Please reimburse me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: More than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Waooooooo its bigger than i thought Honestly i haven't started using it but i love it
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Nji

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! Exfoliates beautifully and smells amazing. 5 stars for sure !!
customer_reviews.author: Minali

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee smell and the way it makes my skin feel. Super smooth and moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabeans

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My hudband and i used it for a long time it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Kath and zoila

customer_reviews.title: Literally leaves my skin feeling soooo soft. I've been ...
customer_reviews.text: Literally leaves my skin feeling soooo soft. I've been using it daily for about a week and I feel a slight tightness and softness. The dead skin cells on the surface are definitely sliding away and allowing the nutrients in the scrub to be absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Armanious

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leave your skin greasy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great scrub that smells so good. I have acne prone skin on my back and chest and this scrub doesn’t leave me so oily after that I feel like I need another shower! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert and no matter what shower gel or body lotion I use, my skin always seems dry until I purchased this product. It is now a permanent part of my shower routine and my skin never seems ashy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice scrub.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this scrub. Makes my skin super soft n it does help with the appearance of the cellulite... only down side was my tub. Whoa! Super greasy and lil coffee bits all over.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Moreno

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this scrub it makes you skin for soft and smooth and it doesn't dry your skin
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Thank God
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this product twice yet, it is really nice. I like the combination of coffee, salt and oil. My face feels smooth without tightness. It also has a fantastic aroma. I believe I will truly like the results for my skin. My only wish is that it is not discontinued like all other wonderful products that work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin incredibly soft!
customer_reviews.text: Feels luxurious, and make skin so soft. However, the jar is much smaller than I thought and I think it's overpriced. That is the reason for the three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes your skin really soft
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the product and am hoping it will reduce some minor stretch marks, time will tell. I am however very satisfied with how soft my skin feels, another reviewer noted that it’s messy, jump in the shower and do it. Mess gone.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. I was worried it would break me ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I was worried it would break me out even though it said that it wouldn't. It felt so good on my skin and after rinsing off, my skin felt so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lowrey

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a good scrub for awhile since I suffer from rough skin, and this is the first product that has worked for me. Combine it with a brush and your legs will feel silky soft and extremely moisturized. My new go to item.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Smells AMAZING. It's super fine like sand
customer_reviews.text: Smells AMAZING. It's super fine like sand. Which I love. Just mix with a mud mask or wet a facial sponge or soft scrub glove and pour a little on. It's worth the buy. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: SGK

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many body scurbs but this one is really good. It’s not too oily and not too dry. It’s the perfect balance. It is reasonably priced and the container is big. I would definitely recommend and buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. It makes her skin really soft
customer_reviews.author: idriveavw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful exfoliation!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this Coffee Scrub! I’ve tried many coffee scrubs in the market and haven’t found one exfoliates and made with clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves an oil like this residue on your skin. Not my favorite only for that reason. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Trabold

customer_reviews.title: Jar only 3/4 full..
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, feels great. However, the jar was only 3/4 full. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah G

customer_reviews.title: Jar not full... Half empty?
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and Jar is half empty.. I stuck my index finger halfway in to nothingness? Can you replace the jar with a full one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It leaves my skin so soft and even is helping with my cellulite. It was recommended to me by a friend and I recommend it as well. Great scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Defective product was shipped.
customer_reviews.text: I received an open jar, half empty. The product was all over the shipping envelope, but it seems there was no much product left anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey D

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This scrub really helped with some stretch marks from a growth spurt. It was gentle and really reduced the marks as they started to appear, and with regular use so far no new ones have appeared.
customer_reviews.author: mtymick

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyed
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this coffee scrub. I mainly used it to help the appearance of my legs and this product really helped make them look smoother. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: My face feels so much more clean and smooth after ...
customer_reviews.text: My face feels so much more clean and smooth after I use this. I use this 1-2 times a week as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Soft smooth and feeling good
customer_reviews.text: The grounds really help to rid of dead skin and any roughness. Every time I used it I felt smooth and soft plus I smelled like freshly brewed coffee. I just wish the container were the size of the Himalayan salt too!
customer_reviews.author: Haillie

customer_reviews.title: Coffee, salt, sugar...on my face!
customer_reviews.text: I have truly enjoyed this product. It envigorates me in the morning. My face is quite supple and ready for my "beat ". Beat = makeup. I like it, and will keep ordering until I find something better. I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Just Khi

customer_reviews.title: Helped smooth the cellulite
customer_reviews.text: This scrub helped my skin looks smooth and the cellulite looked less than before
customer_reviews.author: lourette Awad

customer_reviews.title: So far... So good...
customer_reviews.text: The wife wanted this for her varicose veins and stretch marks. I was concerned she would be smelling like coffee all the time but there was no after smell. So far we both see the veins and stretch marks fading. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product... I use it twice a week in the shower and it leaves my skin feeling so soft and moisturized... all the way down to the heels of my feet... I’m a satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.author: DENISE HAMPTON

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is amazing, makes my skin so soft, and I think it helps with stretch marks yet too soon to judge!
customer_reviews.author: Atusa J Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, makes my skin soft after i use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: smell wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: This stuff,,smell wonderful...!! Look forward to using it! Make skin very very soft! Feel great!
customer_reviews.author: rosesarah

customer_reviews.title: Dead skin be gone
customer_reviews.text: Never been a fan of coffee scrubs but this is the best. My palms feels so smooth, my body is supple, I'm not regretting my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My skin has never felt so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Kittykins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It's smells amazing. Leaves my skin soft and refreshed Not to mention it the smell wakes me up in the morning
customer_reviews.author: katarzyna jachymczyk

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful like fresh pressed coffee
customer_reviews.text: smells wonderful like fresh pressed coffee!! and definitely does a good job of exfoliating, however its no miracle stretch mark/cellulite removed in my opinion; hasn't done anything for me other than keep my exfoliated and glowing when I use it twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty nice. My skin is really sensitive and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this once. It was pretty nice. My skin is really sensitive and it did not break me out at all. My batch was a little dry and my container was not filled all the way, about 3/4ths of the way filled. But all in all it was a pretty good product. I do LOVE art naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Artnaturals!
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Artnaturals products. This scrub is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of the coffee and love the look of my skin afterwards! smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.author: DKL

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described!! Smells so good and leaves my skin soooooo smooth! Also clears dark mark areas!
customer_reviews.author: Tetiauna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super salty but overall pretty good. Just keep it away from your lips!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Smells amazing and leaves skin feeling so soft and touchable!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gore

product_meta.title: Arabica Coffee Body Scrub (20 Oz / 567g)
feature_bullets: EXFOLIATING AND CLEANSING - All natural hand, face and body scrub gently exfoliates the skin, removing dead skin cells and promoting fresh healthier and younger looking skin. Salt scrubs can improve texture, tone and appearance of your skin and help reduce the appearance of cellulite and acne.

ANTI AGING – This facial scrub will help fight signs of aging at every turn. The caffeine in the scrub helps fight acne, age spots, dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles. It will also help lighten the appearance of dark circles by the eyes.

STRETCH MARK CELLULITE AND VERICOSE VEINS – Our Arabica coffee scrub combines dead sea salts with Kona coffee to help reduce the appearance of cellulite, varicose veins, spider veins and stretch marks. Caffeine is known to help stimulate blood flow.

MOISTURIZING: Botanicals extracts, including olive, sweet almond and grape seed oils work together to combat dryness and irritation as they hydrate. Leaving you skin ultra-soft, smooth and beautiful. Not only will this scrub moisturize your skin, but the smell is to die for. This will make you look, feel and smell amazing.
SATISFACTION GAURANTEED – All artnaturals products are Vegan, Sulphate-Free, Gluten-Free, Cruelty-Free and Paraben-Free GMO-Free. Satisfaction guaranteed or 100 percent refund of purchase price.
